title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for chatting with Ollama models, embeddings, and pulling models.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers to interact with the Ollama server.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration that wraps Ollama models for chains, agents, and retrieval.

title: ollama-webui
summary: ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama with multi-model chats, code highlighting, and admin panel.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama exposing synchronous, reactive, and streaming APIs.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rich interactive CLI for Ollama featuring syntax highlighting, history, and themes.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Flutter desktop app for chatting with Ollama models on Windows, macOS, Linux.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with strongly-typed requests, streaming, and dependency-injection helpers.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support, PVC, and autoscaling.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Official compose stacks including CPU, NVIDIA, and AMD ROCm variants plus WebUI.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that brings local LLM assistance to your notes via Ollama.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package for JavaScript/TypeScript developers to interact with Ollama.

title: ollama-pypi
summary: Official PyPI package providing Pythonic access to the Ollama API.

title: ollama-reddit
summary: Active subreddit for discussing new models, tools, and troubleshooting Ollama.

title: ollama-hackernews
summary: Hacker News thread discussing the release of Ollama v0.1.30 with tool use support.

title: ollama-youtube
summary: Tutorial video showing how to integrate Ollama with LangChain for private RAG pipelines.
